sentences.en: A man came to read the electricity metre .
He stands one metre and eighty.
It is about a metre in length.
Let me congratulate you on your winning first place in the 100 metre dash.
sentences.cn: 祝贺你获得百米赛跑第一名。

sentences.en: One hundred centimetres make one metre.
Prices start at £13.95 a metre for printed cotton.
sentences.cn: 印花棉布以每米13.95英镑的价格起售。

sentences.en: The 160-metre falls mark the dramatic confluence of the rivers Nera and Velino.
sentences.cn: 内拉河和韦利诺河的汇合处是落差达160米的瀑布，景象十分壮观。

sentences.en: The 3-metre-square slabs are on a tilt.
The 8844 - metre peak stabbed the sky.
sentences.cn: 这座8844米高的山峰直插云霄.

sentences.en: The average UK coal seam is one metre thick.
sentences.cn: 英国煤层的平均厚度为1米。

sentences.en: The bird has a 1 - metre wingspan.
The snake can squirt poison from a distance of a metre.
sentences.cn: 这种蛇能把毒液喷射到一米处远。

sentences.en: The standard of length in France is the metre.
They erected a 2 - metre - high mud wall on the windward side.
sentences.cn: 他们在迎风的一边筑起了一堵两米高的土墙.

sentences.en: They must each compose a poem in strict alliterative metre.
sentences.cn: 他们必须每人作一首严格押头韵的诗。

sentences.en: Three attempts on the British 200-metre record also ended in failure.
sentences.cn: 对英国200米纪录发起的3次冲击也均以失败而告终。

words.tran_cn: 测量的；韵律的；有韵律的

trans.tran_en: the basic unit for measuring length in the  metric system
the basic unit for measuring length in the  metric system
